name.description: The official or commonly known business name of the company.

industry.description: The sector or category of business operations the company is primarily engaged in.

headquarter.description: The city, state/region, and country where the company's main office is located.

ownership.description: Indicates if the company is publicly traded (Public) or privately held (Private).

foundationyear.description: The year when the company was established or officially founded, often including age.

rank.description: The current overall ranking of the brand.

brandname.description: The name of the company or brand being ranked.

category.description: The industry or sector to which the brand belongs.

mainmarket.description: The primary geographical market served by the brand; in this case, 'Regional'.

2010rank.description: The brand's ranking in the year 2010.

id.description: Unique identifier assigned to each company.

market_cap.description: Market capitalization of the company, representing its total market value.

share_price.description: Current price of one share of the company's stock.

change_1_day.description: Percentage change in the company's share price over the last day.

change_1_year.description: Percentage change in the company's share price over the last year.

categories.description: List of categories or sectors the company belongs to.

company.description: Name of the company for which social media links are provided.

facebook.description: Link to the company's official Facebook page.

twitter.description: Link to the company's official Twitter profile or relevant Twitter search.

instagram.description: Link to the company's official Instagram profile.

pinterest.description: Link to the company's official Pinterest profile or a relevant Pinterest link.

unnamed0.description: Index or row number from the original source file.

valuation.description: The company's estimated valuation in US dollars.

datejoined.description: Date when the company joined the unicorn club (reached a billion dollar valuation).

city.description: City where the company is headquartered or primarily operates.

investors.description: Names of investors who have invested in the company.

founded.description: Year the company was established or founded.

stage.description: Current funding stage of the company's investment rounds.

totalraised.description: Total amount of capital raised by the company through investment rounds.

locations.description: Geographic location of the company's headquarters or primary office.

size.description: The size of the company based on the number of employees.

link.description: URL of the company's page on disfold.com, providing more details about the company.

headquarters.description: City and country where the company's main office is located.

employees.description: Number of people employed by the company. May be listed as 'Not found'.

ceo.description: Name of the company's Chief Executive Officer. May be listed as 'Not found'.

address.description: Full address of the company, including street, city, postal code, and country.

nation.description: Unique national identification number assigned to the company.

hhid.description: Specific hierarchical identifier number assigned to the company.

sic_code.description: Standard Industrial Classification code and description detailing the company's specific business activity.

type.description: Legal structure or type of the company, e.g., Corporation.

est_of_ownership.description: Year of establishment of the company ownership.

sales.description: Company's total sales revenue, likely in billions of US dollars.

profit.description: Company's net profit or earnings, likely in billions of US dollars.

assets.description: Total value of the company's assets, likely in billions of US dollars.

marketvalue.description: Company's market capitalization or total market value, likely in billions of US dollars.

sector.description: Specific sub-category of the industry the company operates in.

notes.description: Additional relevant information or a brief description of the company's activities or products.

number_of_employees.description: Number of employees working at the company.

company_number.description: A unique identification number assigned to the company.

registered_office_address.description: The official, legal address of the company's registered office.

company_status.description: The current operational status of the company, e.g., Active, Dissolved.

company_type.description: The legal company type or structure, such as 'Private limited Company'.

company_creation_date.description: The date when the company was officially established or incorporated.

nature_of_business.description: Describes the company's primary business activities, often including SIC codes.

annual_revenue_in_usd.description: Company's yearly revenue in US dollars.

annual_net_income_in_usd.description: Company's yearly net income in US dollars.

annual_results_for_year_ending.description: Month and year indicating the end of the annual financial period.

total_assets_in_usd.description: Company's total assets in US dollars.

total_liabilities_in_usd.description: Company's total liabilities in US dollars.

total_equity_in_usd.description: Company's total equity in US dollars.

headquarters_region_city.description: City where the company headquarters is located.

headquarters_country.description: Country where the company headquarters is located.

headquarters_sub_region.description: Sub-region of the company's headquarters location.

headquarters_continent.description: Continent of the company's headquarters location.

company_business.description: Business sectors or industries the company is involved in.

founders.description: List of individuals who founded the company.

company_website.description: URL of the company's official website.

url.description: Web address of the company's page in the source registry.

code.description: Company's registration code, a unique numeric identifier.

legalform.description: Type of legal entity the company is registered as (e.g., Private limited company).

status.description: Current registration status of the company (e.g., Entered into register, Deleted).

registrationdate.description: Date when the company was officially registered.

capital.description: Stated capital amount of the company, may include currency information.

deletiondate.description: Date when the company was removed from the registry, if applicable.

areaofactivity.description: Description of the company's primary business activity.

emtakcode.description: Estonian Classification of Economic Activities (EMTAK) code with description.

nacecode.description: Nomenclature of Economic Activities (NACE) code for the company's activity.

source.description: Information about the origin of the data, such as report type and date.

index.description: Index or identifier of the company entry, starting from 0.

tradename.description: Trade name or 'doing business as' name of the company, if different from the legal name.

addressname.description: Street address of the company's location.

postalcode.description: Postal code of the company's address.

state.description: State or region of the company's address; may include abbreviation in parentheses.

locationtype.description: Type of company location, such as Headquarter or Single address.
